values:
Hello LJ world...is anyone still out there?   I feel like everyone is lost in the world of facebook and g+ and twitter and have left poor LJ lost and empty.

Just wanted to say I'm still here.  

<3

Comment and I'll:
a) Tell you why I friended you.
b) Associate you with something -- a fandom, song, colour, photo, etc.
c) Tell you something I like about you.
d) Tell you a memory I have of you.
e) Ask you something I've wanted to know about you.
f) Tell you my favourite userpic from your list.
g) In return, you need to post this on your own journal

BUT....since I've been away from LJ in so long, also please tell me your tower name and/or your RL name so I can actually pull up memories about you. :P

:D
57
All of a sudden I'm soooo sleepy.  why?  The blueberry pie was gooooooood!
Funniest vid EVER: http://ping.fm/IIypv  <-- Those who have ever had to BE tech support for anyone else will LOVE this!! ROFL
Just had to wipe Penaten (Zinc Oxide cream) off of Victoria -- she was covered in it head to toe. The sofa was covered, her dress was covered.  She looked like she was painted white.  Kids.
Finally going to sleep. So tired.  When is the sun coming back??
At edgefest- crazy mud people flinging mud! Music's good tho!
Day 2 over: Phone/Internet was not working, on the phone with support for over 2hrs total. fun.  Other than that -- I LOVE this house!! :)

Day 1 in the new house: No a/c yet -- it was super hot yesterday but it's cooled of today. Appliances scheduled for 8am-11am and phone/cable/internet scheduled for 9am-12pm. Then unpacking starts!! yay! We've a full day ahead of us!
OMG we just got the keys!  My new house is so gorgeous! Yay!!!! *giddy* :D
The Final inspection is TODAY!! eeeeep!  =)   Moving day in T minus 4 days!!!!!
The house looks soooo beautiful!! By this time next week, I'll be living in Bradford!!! w000000t! :)
$199 3Gb iPhone!!!  $299 16Gb iPhone -- avail July 11th!! HOLY MOLY!  My birthday is coming up on 8/8 people.....gift idea!! *wink wink*
Actually, scratch that -- I just remembered it all STARTED with Vikki ---- eeep! I'm the only one who hasn't fallen yet!!    *runs and hides away from the stomach flu*
Stomach Flu....please don't get me!!!! Household tally: 4 down....2 healthy....will Vikki & I make it??? dun, dun, dunnnnnnn!
My tummy hurts! :( In other news, the house looks great!! I can't wait to move!
Off to Bradford, back in a few hours!
We just watched Iron Man, Prince Caspian and Indiana Jones........it was a great evening!! :)   (And Iron Man ROX!)
4 Years Today & still loving every moment!!! Happy Anniversary Babes!!!
Looking for PHP Developers!!! Need a job? Contact me.
Day 2 of our nanny-less week: Busy days, catching up w work so no sleep.  Y-A-Y. :|
*sigh* My nanny has the stomach flu.  This is going to be a hectic week for us! Anyone wanna babysit??  ;-)
HAPPY MOTHER'S DAY!! To all the mother's out there -- have a wonderful day today! :)
It is SOOOOO hot in here!!!  In other news....both kids are in perfect health and back to their old antics again. :P  haha Love kids!!
I adore my kids! They do the cutest things!
Going to Bradford! I'll be back this afternoon.
She's almost fully recuperated, and is slowly getting to be back to her old self again! YAY!
Back from the hospital-we have to force the liquids on her apparently :|
She's sleeping now. Fever's gone down a bit.  Being a parent is uber hard sometimes!

I'm sick to my stomach with worry, she woke up panting and with white lips asking for water! Her fever is higher. :(   Her poop is flowing in rivulets.....I'm trying really hard not to panic.  She's sleeping now but I'm terrified.
So it's official - it's the stomach flu!
Going back to the hospital - she has a fever and is dehydrated - though at least she's not puking anymore
Just going home from the hospital now, on the condition that we monitor her closely.
Taking your kid to the hospital at 10PM in the night is incredibly stressful
We finally chose a real estate agent - he's amazing. Let's hope he can sell this place quick!
August Rush is an AWESOME movie. Go watch it! :D
So the painter did a great job! yay! So now we just have to finish the nursery and we're done with the reno's in here....then....more packing and storage! *sigh*
Professional painters come tomorrow...I hope they do a good job!
So...we're getting a professional to finish the painting! LOL  Oh well.  All is well though!
Family have the unique ability to know exactly how to hurt you and ruin your day. :(
Day 3 in progress.......slow going but it's getting there.  Will paint go on the walls tonight?? Only time will tell!
Day 2 - not bad but we gotta pick up the pace to be ready for Fri!
